The Data Science team at the Strategy Unit comprises the following team members:

- [Chris Beeley](https://github.com/ChrisBeeley)
- [Matt Dray](https://github.com/matt-dray)
- [Ozayr Mohammed](https://github.com/O-Mohammed)
- [Tom Jemmett](https://github.com/tomjemmett)
- [YiWen Hon](https://github.com/yiwen-h)

Current and previous projects of note include:

- Work supporting the New Hospitals Programme, including building [a model for predicting the demand and capacity requirements of hospitals in the future](https://connect.strategyunitwm.nhs.uk/nhp/project_information/), and a tool for mapping the evidence on this topic.
- The [Patient Experience Qualitative Data Categorisation project](https://cdu-data-science-team.github.io/PatientExperience-QDC/) 
- Work supporting the wider analytical community, through events/communities such as [NHS-R](https://nhsrcommunity.com/) and [HACA](https://haca-conference.nhs.uk/).
